entries.notes: Op. 32 no. 4 of 1780 ('opera grande') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue.

ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.577 and M.578. Two copies made in Berlin for Frederick William II.

sources.arrangements: Of the third movement, as part of a quartet (no. 2) for flute, clarinet, horn and bassoon, by O. Van den Broek, c. 1810
